price: ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߛߏ ߛߌߟߊߛߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߮ ߟߊ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߫ ߢߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߕߏ߫ ߝߋߎ߫
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā muṣ'liḥūna
